bio.p: Laura Croce: obtained her M.D. degree at the University of Pavia in 2013. She completed her postgraduate Degree in Endocrinology and Metabolism in 2018 at the University of Pavia. At present she is attending the PhD Couse in Experimental Medicine at the University of Pavia and she is Researcher at the Unit of Endocrinology of ICS Maugeri SpA â€“ I.R.C.C.S, Pavia. Her Research fields are: clinics of thyroid disease, role of chemokines in autoimmune endocrine disorders and thyroid cancer, endocrine disruptors, obesity.
